Buff1_Description: Increased Attack Speed from Critical Strikes.
desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds. Double the Attack Speed bonus when using two Axes.
